Package com.gc.iotools.fmt

Provides the stream format detector for detect the format of the data inside an InputStream, and eventually decode it.

          Description

Class Summary
GuessInputStream InputStream that wraps the original InputStream and guess the format.
ResettableStreamRASAdapter  
ResettableStreamWrapper Helps in mark and reset of decoded streams.
 

Package com.gc.iotools.fmt Description

Provides the stream format detector for detect the format of the data inside an InputStream, and eventually decode it. GuessInputStream
